title: golang/tools/cmd/vet vs golang/go/tree/master/src/cmd/vet, what is the correct one to use?
body:
Hi Brad,

commit 7454f53604b9953b5b7a3897c6b855957f911e66 in its message says:
No more changes to golang.org/x/tools please. This should not have
happened (and letting it happen was partly my fault).

What does it mean? github.com/golang/tools is becoming read only? Or is just no more updates to golang.org/x/tools packages which is, well, exactly the same.

Just wondering, which repository for vet tool is recommend/correct to use?

Jan
